text: Ngouba Singh (born 1 March 1995 in Manipur) is an Indian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Royal Wahingdoh F.C. in the I-League. ==Career== Singh was a part of the Royal Wahingdoh squad that won the 2014 I-League 2nd Division and thus promotion to the I-League. He made his I-League debut on 15 February 2015 against Sporting Goa.
